name: Dahu Hunt
description:
This game is all about hunting a mystical creature in the French Alpes, The Dahu!

This animal has smaller legs on one side because he is always chiming mountains.

If you whistle close enough they fall!

Have Fun!

tips: You can sneak out by drawing his attention by whistling on the other side.

PS: Safari has trouble running the game, please use chrome or firefox

-

This game was made for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme "Unstable"
